text: Arddlîn (sometimes anglicised as Arddleen) is a village in Powys, central Wales. It lies about 5 miles north of Welshpool, in the community of Llandrinio. It had a population of 418 as of the 2011 census, with 31% born in Wales.https://www.nomisweb.co.uk/reports/localarea?compare=W37000218 Previously served by Arddleen railway station on the Cambrian Railway network. ==References== Category:Villages in Powys
title: Arddlin
